title: Oththa Mazhayila Lyrics Kadalai
stanzas:
Kadalai Oththa Mazhayila Song Lyrics
Singer: Hariharan 
Music: Sam CS
Lyrics: Sam CS

oththa mazhayila 
oada karaiyila
thottu thottu vitta 
ottu sediyila poo
ada poo pudhusaa
molaikkum namma
kadhal pola.. (2)

adi unakkaagathaane
unkooda vaaren nanne
unakkaagathaane
vaaren naan vaaren

oru thuli paniyaa nee
ennil vandhu vilundha
neliyira nadhiyaa yaen
enna kara kadandha

un madi saanji naanum
en uyir pogum dhooram
vaaren naan vaaren

adiye adiye 
pala jenmam vazha
vaaren naan vaaren

hey molaikkura vedhayaa naan
unakkulla podhanjen
valayira kodiya un
 manasula padarndhen

adi manasaara naanum
unna enadhaakka naalum
vaaren naan vaaren.

adiye adiye 
ini vazhkai ellaam
vaaren ena thaaren

 oththa mazhayila 
oada karaiyila
thottu thottu vitta 
ottu sediyila poo
ada poo pudhusaa
molaikkum namma
kadhal pola..
